item.title: Effective Programming Practice: Final Project
item.description: Project Description Potentially Useful R Packages Notes on Paper (2017) Notes on Paper (2019) General Notes Project Description Sensitivity Measures for Method of Simulated Moments develop several diagnostic tools for moments based estimation. Your task is to implement those tools in Python and to integrate them in estimagic. The sources: Andrews, Gentzkow & Shapiro (2017): Measuring the Sensitivity of Parameter Estimates to Estimation Moments online PDF 1st application: DellaVigna, List & Malmendier (2012) 2nd application: Gourinchas & Parker (2002) 3rd application: Berry, Levinsohn & Pakes (1995) code archive on Wayback Machine code archive on GitHub Andrews, Gentzkow & Shapiro (2019): On the Informativeness of Descriptive Statistics for Structural Estimates online PDF online appendix erratum Potentially Useful R Packages sensitivity multisensi FME Notes on Paper (2017) Estimatior: \[\hat{θ} = \text{argmin}_{θ\in Θ} \ \hat{g}(θ)'\hat{W}\hat{g}(θ)\] Sentitivity of \(\hat{θ}\) to \(\hat{g}(\hat{θ})\): \[Λ = -(G'WG)^{-1}G'W\] Notes on Paper (2019) General Notes

item.title: Notes on Effective Programming Practice
item.description: Slides Example Process of A Project Clone from Remote Create from Local Runtime: Building Runtime: Testing Shell Reference Basics Pipeline TeX Git Reference Basics Escape Vim Late .gitignore Multiple Branches Tagging Collaboration (Ana)Conda Reference Setup for Zsh Create & Delete Environment Kernels Use Sublime with SendCode Python Waf Reference Config Build Miscellaneous Note: I use macOS Catalina with Zsh (Oh-My-Zsh) and Sublime Text 3.

item.title: Notes on Python 3
item.description: Reference Personal Notes continue, pass & break if __name__ == "__main__" Python on DataCamp Basics Boolean & Comparison Functions Condition & Control Flows Methods Dictionary Tuple Writing Functions Lambda Functions Error Handeling Using Packages Package: Numpy on DataCamp Basics Comparison Methods Control Flows Package: Pandas on DataCamp Create DataFrame Import & Export DataFrame Access DataFrame DataFrame & Series Filter DataFrame Manipulate DataFrame Control Flows Package: Matplotlib on DataCamp Line & Scatter Plot Histogram Plotting Options Package: Seaborn on DataCamp Scatter Plot Relational Plot (Facet Panel) Plotting Options Line Plot Notes from Effective Programming Simple Examples Containers Converting Between Types Alias List & Loop Dictionary Conditions Function Module Numpy Test (Manually) Test: pytest Reference PEP 8 -- Style Guide for Python Code | Python.
